product_name: Nike+ Air Pegasus+ 30 Road-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: The women's Nike Air Pegasus+ 30 road-running shoes offer amazing cushioning and comfort to recreational and seasoned runners alike. Breathable uppers keep your feet well ventilated. All new, full-length Cushlon foam midsoles offer responsive cushioning and forefoot flexibility, making the Air Pegasus+ 30 shoes ideal for neutral runners and supinators. Flexible polyester mesh uppers supply ample ventilation and feature strategically placed overlays for a snug fit without constricting your foot or affecting breathability. Polyester linings wick moisture away from feet for extended comfort during intense runs. Midsoles supply lightweight cushioning and feature a Nike Zoom cushioning unit in the heels for additional comfort. Waffle rubber outsoles provide great traction on multiple surfaces; flex grooves increase stability. A Nike+ sensor works with your iPod(R) nano, iPod touch 2G or later or iPhone(R) 3GS or later to track distance, time, pace and calories burned, relaying the info to you. Waterproof and virtually unbreakable, the Nike+ sensor fits perfectly into the pocket under the left insole (sensor not included).
